Hey, I'm Kshitij Hadke

I'm a dedicated developer focused on building reliable and efficient web applications. I work across the stack with tools like React.js, Next.js, Node.js, Laravel and JavaScript.

I enjoy creating smooth, intuitive interfaces and designing systems that scale well. I take on a mix of personal and freelance projects where I turn complex requirements into clean, practical solutions.

My Projects

ResumeRadar - AI Resume Analyser

    Made with:

AI-powered resume analysis tool where users can upload resumes and get instant insights. Built with React, Tailwind, and Vite for a smooth UI, used pdf.js and Zustand for parsing and state management, and integrated Puter.js for authentication, storage, and AI-driven analysis.

Visit Code

UnlistedShareWala.com

    Made with:

Freelanced project built using Laravel. A full-featured web application for buying and selling unlisted shares, offering real-time listings, secure transactions and an intuitive dashboard. Designed with modern tools to deliver a reliable, scalable and seamless trading experience.

Visit

Maze Maverick - Maze Solver

    Made with:

Maze Solver is a ReactJS application that generates a customizable m x n size maze. Users can either input specific problems or click to randomly generate blockages within the maze. The application then utilizes the Breadth-First Search (BFS) algorithm to find and display the shortest path from the start to the finish.

Visit Code
